Platform.Title: Khodursky Lab E. coli B 4290 ORFs Microarray
Platform.Manufacture-Protocol: 4290 amplified ORFs from primer pairs (from Sigma Genosys) were printed onto glass slides using a 16 tip robotic printer from 384-well microwell plates
Platform.Description: A microarray with 4405 spot features. Tip Configuration: Standard 16-tip

Column.Name: GENE_SYMBOL
Column.Description: Name of the gene represented by the sequence in the spot/feature

Column.Name: GENE_DESC
Column.Description: Description of the gene represented by the sequence in the spot/feature

Sample.Title: Ecoli_Sodium Azide treatment T1

Channel.Source: Escherichia coli W3110, 0 min before treatment in Bonner-Vogel + 50 ug/ml Tryptophan
Channel.Characteristics: Escherichia coli W3110, 0 min before treatment, Bonner-Vogel + 50 ug/ml Tryptophan
Channel.Label: Cy3

Channel.Source: Escherichia coli W3110,5 min 0.01 M Sodium Azide treatment vs 0 min before treatment in Bonner-Vogel + 50 ug/ml Tryptophan
Channel.Characteristics: Escherichia coli W3110,5 min 0.01 M Sodium Azide treatment vs 0 min before treatment in Bonner-Vogel + 50 ug/ml Tryptophan
Channel.Label: Cy5

Sample.Description: 5 min 0.01 M Sodium Azide treatment vs 0 min before treatment in Bonner-Vogel medium
Sample.Data-Processing: Normalized log (2) ratio of Cy5/Cy3, normalized using lowess

Series.Title: Ecoli W3110_0.01 M sodium azide treatment vs untreated, timecourse
Series.Summary: Responses of Escherichia coli W3110 after treatment with 0.01 M Sodium Azide in Bonner-Vogel medium + 50 ug/ml Tryptophan Keywords: time course
Series.Overall-Design: Escherichia coli W3110 cells sampled at several time points (5, 15, 30, 60 min) after addition of 0.01 M sodium azide in Bonner-Vogel + 50 ug/ml Tryptophan, vs untreated
